Package org.slc.sli.dashboard.web.util

Class Summary
ControllerInputValidatorAspect Fix for 3.0 spring to validate @requestbody and @requestparam Aspect provides validation for requestmapping annotated methods since Spring 3.0 provides modelattribute validation only
EncryptionGenerator To generate encrypted clientId and clientSecret by required Dashboard startup.
HTMLCharacterEscapes Implementing CharaterEscapes and customizing HTML character escaping used by Jackson JSON generator.
HtmlEscapingFreeMarkerTemplateLoader Wrapper for freemarker template loader that ensured html escaping for each template
HtmlEscapingFreeMarkerTemplateLoader.HtmlEscapingFreeMarkerConfigurer Configure for all the template loaders to use escaping wrapper
JacksonObjectMapperWithOptions A wrapper for jackson ObjectMapper with some useful features enabled
NoBadCharsValidator Validator for NoBadChars.
 

Annotation Types Summary
NoBadChars Simple blacklist validator
